title: Pink Floyd - Dark side of the moon
content: Concept album by the British rock group Pink Floyd from 1973. The themes of the 9 tracks on the album are the problems of modern life: money, greed, transience, madness and war.

title: Pink Floyd - The Wall
content: Concept album in the form of a rock opera by the British rock group Pink Floyd, released in 1979, also known in Poland under the translation of the title as Åšciana. Pink Floyd - The Wall, directed by Alan Parker, was based on the album.

title: Depeche Mode - Songs of Faith and Devotion
content: Depeche Mode's eighth album. The release was described as another breakthrough in the band's work. This is the most rocking despatches album. The Devotional Tour lasted over a year. It led to numerous misunderstandings, as a result of which Alan Wilder left the band on June 1, 1995. A box set was released after the release of the album. Box of Faith and Devotion containing all tracks from the recording session.

title: Ozzy Osbourne - Ozzmosis
content: The seventh studio album by British singer Ozzy Osbourne, released in 1995. According to data from April 2002, the album sold 1,572,385 copies in the United States.

title: AC/DC - Highway to Hell
content: The sixth studio album by Australian rock band AC/DC, released on July 27, 1979. It is also the band's fifth worldwide released studio album. All songs by Angus Young, Malcolm Young and Bon Scott. The album was originally released by Atlantic Records. So far it has sold over 7 million copies in the United States. In 2003, the album was ranked 199th on Rolling Stone's list of the 500 greatest albums of all time.

title: Scorpions - Rock Believer
content: Rock Believer is the nineteenth studio album by German rock band Scorpions, released on 22 February 2022 in the United Kingdom and 25 February elsewhere. This is the band's first studio album with drummer Mikkey Dee, who replaced James Kottak in 2016, and their first studio album in seven years since Return to Forever (2015), making it their longest gap between studio albums.
